rationalpiano.input
Class TuioInput

java.lang.Object
  rationalpiano.input.TuioInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
TUIO.TuioListener
public class TuioInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements TUIO.TuioListener

Manages TUIO Multitouch input and de/activates the according voices and notes

Version:
1.02
Author:
Fabian Ehrentraud
Licence:
Licensed under the Open Software License (OSL 3.0)
Date:
2010-10-10

Constructor Detail

TuioInput

public TuioInput(processing.core.PApplet papplet,
                 IVoices voices,
                 INoteOutput noteoutput,
                 IGraphicControls graphiccontrols,
                 int tuioPort)
Initializes the TUIO receiver.

Parameters:
papplet - The processing applet to get the size of for scaling TUIO input
voices - The Voices object to add/remove voices to/from.
noteoutput - The NoteOutput object to send note on/off messages to.
graphiccontrols - The IGraphicControlsPassive object to ask for line positions.
tuioPort - The local UDP port the TUIO Listener should listen at
Method Detail

finalize

public void finalize()
Close socket when quitting. FIXME won't get called - but actually it isn't needed either

addTuioCursor

public void addTuioCursor(TUIO.TuioCursor tcur)
Called when a cursor is added to the scene. This adds a new voice corresponding to the line at the pressed point.

Specified by:
addTuioCursor in interface TUIO.TuioListener
Parameters:
tcur - Cursor that has been added.

updateTuioCursor

public void updateTuioCursor(TUIO.TuioCursor tcur)
Called when a cursor is moved. This is being ignored in this application.

Specified by:
updateTuioCursor in interface TUIO.TuioListener
Parameters:
tcur - Cursor that has been moved

removeTuioCursor

public void removeTuioCursor(TUIO.TuioCursor tcur)
Called when a cursor is removed from the scene. This releases the according voice.

Specified by:
removeTuioCursor in interface TUIO.TuioListener
Parameters:
tcur - Cursor that has been removed.

refresh

public void refresh(TUIO.TuioTime bundleTime)
Called after each message bundle representing the end of an image frame. This is being ignored in this application.

Specified by:
refresh in interface TUIO.TuioListener
Parameters:
bundleTime - Time that the whole bundle has been sent at.
